name: The Test (see brews  games)
description:
this game was built live on YouTube. 

play as a star tying to make your way home through the the maze of this world. 

computer  controllers :  

up (arrow up, w) 

down (arrow down, s)

left (arrow left, a)

right(arrow  right , d)

A (alt, z, j)

B (control, k, x) 

start (Enter)

select (shift)
